messages.title: A RECORD OF ACTION
messages.content: Geoffrey Clifton-Brown has a strong record of delivery for The Cotswolds. Working with the Government, he has been able to achieve real results for local residents.

messages.title: A POSITIVE RESPONSE TO COVID FROM GEOFFREY CLIFTON-BROWN
messages.content: Geoffrey Clifton-Brown has worked tirelessly during the Covid crisis to support individuals, businesses and charities across The Cotswolds.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investments in roads and rail to cut congestion.
Increase investment in our health service each year.
Back our schools with more investment.
More help with childcare and looking after loved ones.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The leaflet encourages tactical voting by stating that every vote for Geoffrey is a vote for a strong Government led by David Cameron.

issues.education: Geoffrey supports schools with more investment.
issues.governance: The leaflet mentions David Cameron and the Conservative government's leadership.
issues.health: Increase investment in the NHS each year.
issues.socialWelfare: Supporting families with childcare and care for loved ones.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am asking for your support on 6th May to continue my work representing The Cotswolds.

politicalExperience.achievements: Working with the Government to achieve results for local residents.

quotes.text: Every vote for Geoffrey is a vote for a strong Government led by David Cameron.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet places a strong emphasis on the candidate's alignment with the national Conservative Party leadership and the tactical importance of supporting the local MP to contribute to a Conservative-led government.
